posts.post_content:
Extremely nice card with perfect centering, great registration and virtually no chipping along the borders. There is a small print spot on Ty's face and some toning on the back is present. There are no creases or wrinkles. This a very nice 4 with outstanding eye appeal. Asking sold delivered. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for looking.

[url]dean.hackett@surewest.net[/url]

[IMG]http://i101.photobucket.com/albums/m52/DHack3/BB%20Cards/T205CobbSGC4_zps05723fa4.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i101.photobucket.com/albums/m52/DHack3/BB%20Cards/Card%20Backs/8d13aeb6-4ec4-4ce1-9d5d-0b0b239d50a3_zpsfb594431.jpg[/IMG]
Bump for price reduction. Thanks for looking.
